name: Ozo's Theme
description:
(you can use the WASD keys or the arrow keys to play the game!)

Ozo is a triangle lost in the world of shapes. Worse, they don't even have a theme song to keep them pumped up on their adventure! Help Ozo find their theme by completing musical puzzles in the colorful world of shapes! Ozo's Theme features over 10 short musical puzzles and a soundtrack that builds as you progress through the game.
